title: Khazad Ai-menu (4C51)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Skirmish: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or strength +3 and damage +1 if you spot Legolas).
Lore:	”'The Orcs are behind the wall. Ai-oi! Come, Legolas! There are enough for both of us.'”
Rarity:	C
